item.title: #tlah Getting started with virtualization using VirtualBox
item.description: Do you want to check out Linux on your current machine safely, leaving your current set up untouched? Virtualization allows you to do this using VirtualBox. We are investigating this method to integrate BYOD with our 1 to 1 program. Wikihow has a nice write up on how to install …
item.dc:creator: mr.rcollins

item.title: Linux for 1:1 instead of Chromebooks or iPads
item.description:
(This post is basically me thinking out loud...)

Like many districts, my district is looking at devices for a 1:1 program. The top three devices seem to be Chromebooks, iPads, Windows or OS X laptops. Costs are the main driving factor for a lot of districts, which basically means …
item.dc:creator: mr.rcollins
